actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that an employee shall not be paid overtime compensation for overtime hours worked without authorization.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that an employer shall not be required to pay overtime compensation to an employee for overtime hours worked without the employer's authorization.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that an employee shall not be paid overtime compensation for overtime hours worked without authorization.
